title: 14 day suspension... wtf?
body:
I buy a lot of RP, almost every female champ that comes out.

I don't deserve 14 day ban for:

Here are some chat logs that were identified as negative by other players in the community.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
gonna alt f4 soon
theres actually 3 of u %%%gots that didnt bother banning him
3 of u %%%s deserve this loss
3 of u %%%its actually desrve this loss
i told u %%%%%%s in champ select no peel for yi and rengar
HAHAHHA
this is over, payce
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

what the fuck? there's no chat filter so why the hell would I get banned for this?

replies.body: You're providing a negative experience to the other people playing the game. It's not okay to berate or insult people at school or work so why would you think it's okay to do so to real people playing this game?

Why would you say those words? are you trying to get a Reaction out of Riot? {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} Dont be toxic, yell if you want, dont type it and make things worse. take this time to reflect on how you talk to people.
the 5th line is the n word ;)
